Uses of Class
org.dyn4j.geometry.Feature

  • Packages that use Feature 
    Package Description
    org.dyn4j.geometry
    This package contains geometric objects used by the collision detection package.

    • Uses of Feature in org.dyn4j.geometry

      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  Edge
      Represents an edge feature of a Shape.
      class  Vertex
      Represents a point on the edge of a Shape.
